official_title: A bill to amend section 16 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, relating to the special needs of the elderly and handicapped.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to permit, for use to meet operating expenses, up to 20 percent of the funds allocated to make grants and loans to private nonprofit corporations and associations for the purpose of assisting them in providing transportation services for elderly and handicapped persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 16 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, relating to the special needs of the elderly and handicapped.
